DOC.detailed_description: Comparison two combination chemotherapy treatment patient SLCL The combination chemotherapy study Carboplatin plus Irinotecan versus Carboplatin plus Etoposide .
DOC.criteria: cytological histological proven SCLC Stage I II 1st diagnosis prior chemotherapy measurable tumor disease karnofsky performance 70 second malignancy ( except basal cell carcinoma , CA situ Cervix uterus ) NYHA III chronic diarrhea , obstructive bowel syndrome
